name: Visenture
description: Visenture is a comprehensive investment management and stock trading application designed to simulate real-time stock market trading. It allows users to buy and sell stocks, manage their portfolios, and access market analysis. The application is divided into two main components: a robust backend developed with NestJS and an interactive frontend built with Angular.

name: ArtesaniasBGA
description: This project consists of an e-commerce platform that allows users to purchase products online, while integrating inventories with physical points of sale and analyzing customer behavior. The system architecture is event-based and organized by layers.

name: ScrappingML
description: Website that performs products from Mercado Libre, extracting key information and building a Datawarehouse. The data collected is visualized in an interactive Dashboard with graphic analysis that allows identifying trends, price ranges and other relevant patterns of the market.
